info.title: BLPaczka API
info.description:
To integrate with our API, please follow the instructions:
 * 1. Create a customer account at [sandbox.blpaczka.com](https://sandbox.blpaczka.com)
 * 2. Complete the customer profile and generate an API key
 * 3. Recommended payment option is prepaid bank
 * 4. To top up the user's prepaid bank in the sandbox environment:
 *  - go to the 'Skarbonka' tab and press the 'Doładuj środki' button
 *  - enter the amount and press the 'Doładuj środki' button
 *  - press the 'Płacę poprzez Paynow.pl' button
 *  - select the 'Przelewy online' option and then 'mBank mTransfer' and press the 'Płacę' button
 * 5. After topping up the prepaid bank, you can send parcels using the 'bank' payment option.
 * 6. To send the first parcel:
 *  - go to create order method [Create Order Docs](https://send.blpaczka.com/api/docs#tag/Orders/operation/7f869b647c9bd888e770dacf29a89c3b)
 *  - add the email and key obtained from [sandbox.blpaczka.com](https://sandbox.blpaczka.com) to the auth object
 *  - complete the shipment details in accordance with the documentation
 *  - send and done

post.description: Method to get cart order status

400.description: Invalid input or missing required parameters

get.description: Retrieve a list of invoices filtered by various parameters. The list is ordered by the invoice ID in descending order and includes associated orders and their generation requests.

parameters.name: wystawiono_od
parameters.description: Filter invoices created on or after this date

parameters.name: wystawiono_do
parameters.description: Filter invoices created on or before this date

parameters.name: payed
parameters.description: Filter invoices that are paid or not

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: Filter invoices by the model field

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Filter invoices by the waybill number

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific invoice using its unique ID and hash.
Downloads the specified invoice by its unique ID. Marks the invoice as downloaded if successful.

parameters.name: unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the invoice to download

post.description: Method to retrieve a list of available payment options for creating an order using the createOrder method.

end_default_hour.description: Default end hour when filling out the order form

get.summary: Retrieves uptake information with filtering options
get.description: Returns a list of uptakes and related data with the ability to filter by date range, status, return conditions, and more. Filtering is applied based on provided query parameters.

parameters.name: dodano_od
parameters.description: Filter uptakes created on or after the specified date

parameters.name: dodano_do
parameters.description: Filter uptakes created on or before the specified date

parameters.name: return_from
parameters.description: Filter uptakes by return from date

parameters.name: refund_id
parameters.description: Filter uptakes by specific refund IDs

parameters.name: numer-nazwa
parameters.description: Search across multiple fields including order name, street, city, and more

200.description: A successful response with filtered uptake details

get.summary: Download uptake details as an Excel file
get.description: Generates an Excel file containing uptake details and initiates a download

200.description: A successful response with the Excel file download
